Mom's Kitchen is a total vibe, loved that they had the Cartoon Network channel playing. Food was good, ordered the brisket sandwich and the shortcake milkshake. Brisket was juicy and the milkshake was amazing, definitely the highlight of the meal. Can't wait to visit again!

So me and my girlfriend visited Mom's kitchen & Bar for brunch on her birthday. We were very excited to try this place based on the reviews. Sadly we were very disappointed in the food we received. We started with a appetizer of wings and there wasn't any flavor very bland. Then we ordered the shrimp and grits and steak and eggs with fries. The shrimp and grits was not worth the cost we had a big plate of grits with 5 shrimp. And the steak was very bland no flavor and I thought I was getting fries but I just got big chopped up potatoes and sweet potatoes with a lot of salt. Also I asked for scrambled eggs with cheese but I got scrambled eggs with a slice of cheese on top. We left Mom's with a stomach ache.

First time visiting. Initially, we were told it would be a 30 minute wait, but it was only 15. The food came out equally as quick. I had the shrimp and grits which were very filling and tasty.
Great vibes super clean place  our waiter ALAN WAS SUPER NICE AND HELPFUL with all our questions he his the truth definition of customer service I highly recommend this place if you are visiting

10!!  Needed a place for late night dinner so we found this place and it looked fun!  We were correct!  The menu is eclectic as well as the whole vibe!  Our margarita pitcher had a rubber duck in it, I mean how freaking fun is that!   The food was amazing!  It's like some old skoool, southern comfort food mashup that was great!!  If we lived in the city this would def be one of our regular haunts!!  Hubby who is vegan raves at the options on the menu.  It's not like the slap a vegan patty on a bun and call it a day, there is a special menu section and entrees are fully thought out with sauces and developed flavors.   They were a full menu thought not and afterthought!!  Way to go!!

their brunch is awesomeeeee i had the chicken waffle and some of the pb chocolate french toast it was simply divine ... our server was very fun as well

The food was great just had to get my waitress other than that everything was good. I wanted something different instead of the same ole things I normally order. The mac n cheese pancakes were different but soooo delicious. I would definitely recommend for anyone visiting NY.

This place has such an d school vibe and the environment is so welcoming. Host and servers great you right away as well bring water to the table while you go over the menu. The food was good, mashed potatoes a little dry. Overall, good experience! Thanks you for your service Mom's Kitchen

GIVE CHANCE A RAISE!!!!! Amazing service, gorgeous smile! Got me and Family in and out! We had a bridal shop to get to and the service made sure we got our food right away! Thanks to the service we received we had a great day! Chance at the end of the day gave 1000%
Fantastic experience. Some say this is a tourist trap but if it is, that's okay. My family and I loved it. Great food. Great service.

Got chicken and waffles. The chicken was soggy to the point the breading was almost wet. The bacon on it was completely rubber and so chewy it could be swallowed. $20 for below average chicken and waffles seems a bit steep. I've eaten many breakfast spots and I have no idea how this place has over a 4 star average on yelp. 2 stars for good service.

A very cute place for brunch or even dinner. With a place that serves all day brunch you can't really go wrong. I do love their diverse menu options and they'll have something that everyone loves. The vibe is very fun and I would go back!

This was the first time that I have ever been  to Mom's, since we were visiting from out of town.  It was loud and busy (even though it was the Wednesday before Thanksgiving).  Our server was attentive though and was not phased by the size of our group (4 adults and 2 kids, arriving at slightly different times).  In honesty, I was so captivated by my companions that I didn't pay as much attention to the details, but it was overall terrific!  The milkshakes were crazy- so over the top!

Great location to get food Kiana was the person in charge tremendous service by her, Will be seeing my face again.

Mom kitchen is absolutely amazing this is the perfect opportunity to go out even if it's last minute or whether you choose to go with friends or family or even a day night. The food is well cooked seasoned and prepared. Plus it comes out in a decent time and the prices are fair. The drinks are very good for the price and is presented well . Highly recommend to Anyone on the staff is friendly and respectful !
Visited nyc and checked this place out for breakfast. Absolutely amazing, make sure you go on an empty stomach. Great, friendly and attentive service. Will definitely be back!

Great place with concise menu. You can tell that the cooks really care about what goes out of the kitchen. The omelets are tall and fluffy and the avocado toast with a poached egg was delicious. I real treat in NYC.
There was a giant piece of egg shell in my avocado toast this morning and they did not even bother to take it off the bill for us. The food was blend and very disappointing.

Too much fat on that thick ass bacon. Bloody Mary's were woah. Not good. The gym bod breakfast was basic but got the job done. Would not recommend if you wanna eat healthy
First time coming here, the food was great, everything was at reasonable price and our server Chance was fantastic!
Amazing drinks and food! Our server, Chance, had great recommendations and was super attentive! Definitely coming back.

Quick and friendly. Mac and cheese buffalo balls and pancakes were superb. Out side dining was an experience!!!

Mom's was so great this weekend!  Patrick was very helpful with the menu, and we decided on the Fruity Pebbles milkshake (Get a mug and big spoon!).  The peach tea cocktail was delicious, and the peach tea as a beverage alone was so refreshing.

Came across this spot while on a business trip and came home talking about it. Great service, great food, the 80s theme of the restaurant was spot on and made me smile. The shakes are a must have . HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

Mom's is like that dope vibe restaurant that serves brunch all day. COVID has been hard but they really do make the best of it here by providing sanitizer everywhere and distancing each table. Menus are on the QR code and I would definitely recommend getting the breakfast items here. Be aware that there's a cheese overload on the dishes. I had opted for the shrimp and cheese grits and my bf had gotten the chicken and waffles. I had thoroughly enjoyed both and had filled me up quick. I've only afr half of my frits and I was good to go lol. This is my first time eating grits and it was everything I had imagined. The chicken and waffles were good but I would suggest to get the cheese on the side even though it looks picture worthy if they put it on for you. I would def come back here whenever i'm in the area craving for brunch. We had stopped by on a saturday night and parking was a bit yikes though.
No comment
The best diner in Midtown and certainly one of the best in all of Manhattan. I highly recommend you stop here!

Living in my neighborhood for almost twenty years, it is the first time trying Mom's for date night - and it did not disappoint. The decor gave us that nostalgic feel and the music from the 80's and 90's was so appreciated. The menu was just a who's who of delicious food and took us a bit to pin point what to get because everything looked good. The steak was delicious with the overeasy eggs and potatoes and my wife's chicken and gravy was awesome. The portion was a lot so one got their money's worth. But wait, there's more. On came desert and it was literally the icing on the date night. My pumpkin pie float with a slice of pie on it was the greatest thing I have ever seen and tasted. I felt like a happy kid in an ice cream shop. I wanted another one but had to leave something for the other customers (lol). Also excellent was the service - all of the staff is friendly and attentive but special shout-out to Raquel, our waitress who helped guide us, had some good conversation with her, recommended her favorites and added to the great night out. We are definitely going back to try the other things and recommend any one else looking for a fun, delicious, cool night out.
OMG  Sarah the bartender made my birthday so very special! The vibes, drinks and food was A-mazing!! Definitely ask her for her thoughts on food and drinks... she will NOT steer you wrong

Been coming her for 5+ years, from the cute childhood-disney-nostalgia theme, to the food, this place is the best of the best. All the meat is cooked just right and the shakes are something beyond this world. The decor and disney shows playing in the background just add to the general ambience. Not to mention the staff is some of the friendliest! Could not recommend more.
The food was not that good, and I was misgendered by the server when I asked where the restroom was which is strange for a restaurant in a predominantly LGBTQ+ neighborhood.
No comment
No comment
Great place! Food was great and server kiana M was awesome! the hospitality was welcoming. Over all I give moms a 9.5
No comment
Great place, the food was amazing‼ Benny the host was very welcoming and friendly he Even suggested a perfect meal that I enjoyed . Look forward to coming here again.
place is amazing, benny made it even better, the best customer service I've  ever received. We'll be coming back just for benny and the amazing food.
No comment

This place was amazing!! The portions are huge, the food is amazing, and the decorations are super cute. The mimosas are HUGE and everything here has a unique style to it and i absolutely loved it. Chance was such a great server and i would 100% recommend getting him when you come!! I will definitely be coming back
No comment
The food was over cooked, with very little flavor, and over priced. Big portions, but I prefer better prepared food over big portions. Nice vibe inside but again, lackluster food.
No comment

I waited almost 2 years to come back and I must say it was almost as delicious as I remembered. I ordered the Chicken and waffles and the cheese sauce mixed with honey was amazing. The only issue I has was the temperature was almost room temperature and my bacon was chewy. I didn't complain because I was wayyyy to eager to eat. I will definitely be back!
Service was so good nice they support everyone and gay people don't have to feel left out of place. Plus don't get me started on the food was so good had bedrock pancakes and eggs ham enjoyed myself
No comment

The service here was excellent! Alan our server was friendly and very knowledgeable about the food and drinks on the menu. I ordered the wrap God from the Mom's Fit menu,  the wrap comes with chicken, bell peppers, arugula and avocado and a side of curly fries. The wrap wasn't bad, it just tasted very healthy and bland. If you're on a strict diet and are not looking for something with flavor then this is a great option. Even the curly fries were just ok, I had some of my friend's salad and the chicken that came with her salad was much better than mine. The sangria was actually pretty good. The place is cute and has great staff so if I return I will definitely order something different that hopefully has more flavor.
No comment

Is the food here amazing? No. Is it bad? No. It's the kind of food that you'd enjoy if you had munchies, very high calorie meals. But nothing special that would make me come back running to eat here again.

Omg!!! This place is amazing. Our server Jae was wonderful. What a beautiful character. So full of joy and happiness. She made a meal even that much better. So let's start off with the drinks. The sangria with blackberry was divine. The disco fries are the best fries I've ever had in my life. And there's not even a close second... And I love food. The shrimp and grits were sublime. Unfortunately I was kind of full by the time I got to them.  The breakfast sandwich do not seem on the same level as everything else. But the salad was excellent with the grape vinaigrette dressing. There's so many things on this menu I want to try. The only problem is that I probably gained 15 pounds from today alone!!!!

This review is only about my order. I saw all the pictures from other posters about their chicken and waffles and I was so excited to try it. The food came out fast and service was good, I just wish my chicken looked half as good ad everyone else's chicken. I got the béchamel sauce and maple syrup on the side only to reveal that my chicken was half coated and overcooked. The waffle was awesome and get it again but hopefully the chicken would come out the right way next time.

Not too impressed with this place but good for your typical American city grub. It had a diner feel to it with this place. I had the avocado toast with eggs which was alright and something I could make at home myself. This place was very busy!

We chose this restaurant for Sunday brunch having read the creative options on the menu. We were thrilled to have a satisfying meal. The decor is fun, with metal lunchboxes which appealed to Gen-X me. Service was excellent and we were glad that COVID-19 protocols were being followed. And the food! The avocado toast was topped with a poached egg, some fresh veggies and this awesome pickled red onion. The sourdough bread was just divine. We also ordered the breakfast sandwich with Taylor ham that was also delicious. The side of home fries feature potatoes and sweet potatoes which was a refreshing change. It was all so delectable!
No comment

The bartender at Dolly Varden recommended this place for breakfast and it did not disappoint. I had the avocado toast and my husband had The chicken and bacon waffle. We also ordered a side of thick bacon that is a must have. Both meals were excellent and we will definitely come back
No comment
No comment
Kiana was very attentive and kind , be sure to request her. The cheese grits are amazing , must try !
No comment

This was my first visit and the food and service was the bomb.  Our server, Chance was phenomenal, as well as the host, Michelle.  Also, we couldn't believe how fast we received our food, it was hot and delicious. I would definitely visit Mom's Kitchen again when I'm in New York.
The food and service was delicious and I love the Nostalgia of the restaurant. The portions are really big.

I'm giving more stars because it's adorable in here and the staff is kind, but honestly everything we ate was so below average and I GOT GOT with all these positive reviews. Cheeseburger was super dry, the tomato soup was missing an oil or cream element to make it comforting. It was very acidic and immediately dissolved on your tongue into flavorless nothingness, also came with a dry breadstick that was supposed to be cheesy. The Mac and cheese balls were missing the crunch and were similar to mush balls, also served on lettuce like it's 2010. I thought the general consensus was we don't do hot lettuce anymore? The pickle slaw had awesome flavor but a bit too many onions. Probably should have just got the sweet stuff like the pebbles pancake but I'm not going back to find out. Feels like a weird tourist trap with a pride flag slapped on it. Also odd that there's no dairy alternative for the milkshake? I thought we were past that.
No comment

So I normally don't leave reviews BUT: Mom's Kitchen and Bar was too perfect in every way NOT to leave a review. That being said, I was taken care of by Jessica and met the manager, Kayla, briefly. The food is delicious and unique, the shakes are incredible - like... ?? Howdeydodat? Anyways. Go there. Eat something. Or don't, grab a shake and booze it up with friends, but GO.
Sarah was so amazing she really helped us get the best food choices an great vegan options! An she even surprised me with my birthday dessert an sang for me !!
Sarah was the best bartender I've had in a while! Super friendly and kind. Looking forward to coming back. Food was great.
No comment
OMGGGG !!!! this place is amazing!! The food, staff, service and ambiance is wonderful!! I wish I could give it 10 stars!!!!!! If you're in NY please do your self a favor dine in!!

There are so many restaurants doing their best with outdoor dining now but Mom's takes it many notches higher. The staff greet you with "Welcome Home!" when you arrive and it does sort of feel like home with the excellent social distancing measures they put in place. The tables are nicely distanced and have dividers so you don't have to worry about the neighbouring tables and their proximity to you. There are so many thoughtful gestures like the straws for the water provided (just so you don't have to sip from the same cup as so many others), sanitised cutlery (!!!) etc. The food is good and homely but honestly, the service and whole experience makes me want to keep going back and support them.

Not even sure how we stumbled on this spot but I'm glad we did. Our server Nina was very friendly and personable. Everything we ordered was hot and fresh. The portions are big so we all split the entrees. The chicken bacon waffle was great. It came with regular and spicy syrup.  The chicken had a good and crunchy batter on it. We also had the pancake burrito. It was awesome as well. As we saw plates pass by, we ordered the French fries. They were hot, fresh, and crunchy  The margaritas were on point. This spot did not disappoint!!

My first experience was the best! Had a cousin from out of town visit and my sister suggested this spot because she's a foodie like me.  Man the customer service deserves 10 Stars  everyone is super welcoming and friendly.  Soon as you walk through the door the host says "welcome home" gets no better than that wait it does....The food OMG I never in my wildest dream would have thought MAC and Cheese a pancake could have such a great marriage but these folks know what they are doing they are a must try.  My cousin is a Vegan and they had great options. We had some small tikes and they had more than they bargained for .  All I can say is I will be back soon

What an amazing place!! Food is delicious and the amount of food you get really should be enough for 2 people. Our waiter Chance was fabulous and made sure we were taking care couldn't have asked for a better waiter. Make sure to get the Buffalo Mac and Cheese balls because they are to die for.
No comment
No comment
No comment
Fun restaurant with lively music and funky decorations. Our group was seated immediately on a Saturday afternoon. All the food was tasty. Shrimp and grits dish was fabulous. Friendly service.
No comment
Laina was AMAZING!! Def rec! If you could be seated in her section, do!! Bloody Mary's with extra bacon was phenomenal. Waiting line was long but Laina definitely made the experience worthwhile.
No comment

Grabbed a table in the sun for brunch and it was glorious. Started with the momosa ie double mimosa and chicken waffles. It was so much food I had to take it home to not feel wasteful. Loved the vibes, the service, the 60s music, it's the cool hipster diner you never thought you'd love :)

My sister and I had the best time here! We loved our brunch so much that we came back near the end of our trip to buy a shake and mug. Not only is the food fun and delicious, we received the best customer service here. I will definitely be coming back every time I'm in the city!

Visited Moms Kitchen in Hell's Kitchen area this past weekend based on Yelp reviews. Definitely would recommend if you are visiting the city and want a friendly, fun & eclectic menu & boozy drinks. We sat at the bar and Sarah took great care of us and great conversation as well. I ordered the pancake burrito and the chilly pepper coffee - yum!
No comment

If you haven't checked "brunch in snowy 30 degree weather" off your quarantine bucket list, you're not doing it right ;) Mom's serves up comfort diner food with spontaneous flair. Check out my Bedrock Pancakes (read, fruity pebbles!). Stay warm in the arctic chill with their "hot girl summer" cocktail, which comes in an inflatable flamingo apparatus. This is a perfect spot during covid... all the heating, distancing, and partitioning I could dream of in this time period, and the food/service really lifted my spirits! Thanks Mom's!
No comment
No comment

This is a good place to stop for decent comfort food. We weren't in the mood for something extremely heavy so we settled for the market plate. You can order three "sides" and any additional you would like. We had the melon which was nice and fresh and sweet, curly fries that tasted how the should (although that portion I thought was a bit too much on the small side), Mexican street corn which was delicious and Brussel sprouts. My kid was happy with a lemonade and I was happy with a size large sangria. It wasn't the booziest I've ever had but that was probably best since I was headed to the bolt bus in about an hour. The inside is great...kitchy with whimsical decor. We dined outside and enjoyed the bustle of the people. The service was good and we were glad we stopped in.
First time visiting NY & we just had to try this place.  Best fruity pebble's pancakes ever!

Fun decor and wide-open dining area. Service was excellent (and quick). Food was pretty good, but didn't match the rest of the experience. Sweet potatoes in the home fries were...interesting. Toast and eggs were just fine. Pork-sage sausage was very good -- star of the meal.

The food was delicious.  Generous portions, food items packed well and very tasty. We ordered the street corn, shrimp with Cajun seasoning, dry wings, sweet potato fries, and the Egg white Abdomolette - everyone fully enjoyed their meal.
No comment
No comment

First of all , my friends and I went to a place across the street to start off the night .. realized moms was across the street and just had to go !! Sarah was our waitress and she was AMAZING .. she kept checking in on us if we needed anything else if we liked our drinks and food ( food was so good I've been here twice already and drinks were great as well ) she even laughed at our drunk jokes  her energy is FANTASTIC literally the life of the party if we were at one .. she was great 10/10 experience just because of her ( and the food and drinks but really her haha )
Shrimp and grits were delicious! Also the wings appetizer was perfect. And a really nice guy serving.  Thanks!
No comment
Everything was great! The service was was amazing , the food was bomb, and the drinks were strong! Mando for anytime in nyc

We visited the city for a few hours today and stopped at Mom's kitchen & bar and the service and food was outstanding. The bar tender Daniel, made me a margarita that he recommended and it was so good I ordered another! He was very friendly and has mad bar tending skills! Will definitely come back here if we ever visit the city again :).
Loved this place, was looking for somewhere where i could get great drink but also go with my underage cousins & this place did the trick. Drinks are huge & the food is good 10/10
Stumbled into Mom's and gratefully got Chance as our waiter. He was attentive, responsive, and so cute! His recommendations were perfect--like his hair. Highly recommended!
Love this place so much! Everything I'm in the neighborhood I come here! Chance is the best!
SOOOOO GOOD!!!!! The brunch food is so unique and its definitely the best joint i've been to in NYC. The eggs benedict and the chicken and bacon waffles were phenomenal. Love u guys
No comment
No comment
Place was amazing. Waiter was amazing. Drinks were great and the food was too  Definitely coming back ‼

By the time the avocado toast got to me, it was cold and soggy. Plus, I didn't taste much avocado in the avocado paste. I would not recommend it. I tried to order a shake, but I couldn't wait another 30 minutes for it and had to cancel it. Slow and not worth the hour wait to be seated nor the 40 mins for the food.

Such great food and drinks. Awesome retro decor. The French toast burrito and chicken & waffles were both fantastic. Strong coffee and swift service, plus they had a fun Schitt's Creek trivia night when we were there, too.

Great find in Hell's Kitchen. We went for breakfast and got the breakfast sandwich and a monthly special-- French toast with Nutella and berries. I personally like my bacon a bit crispier (should have asked for it) but everything was delicious. The breakfast potato hash is a mix of white and sweet potatoes (mine was mostly sweet) that was cooked well and a generous side dish. Would love to go back and try a grown up milkshake!

Chicken and waffle was incredible!! And the mimosa was huge. Staff was friendly, punctual, and efficient. We also came on a Saturday with no reservation and waited maybe 10 minutes. Super great all around

column1: I C Y U N V S.
column6: No comment

We're visiting NYC and chose Mom's our first night here because it's so close to our hotel. The food was terrific and our server, Noah, was attentive and friendly without being intrusive. We brought a party of 13 there the following night and Noah once again made sure we were all well taken care of. Two of us went back for breakfast the following morning and a severely sleep deprived Noah was tickled that we kept our word and came back. Nice restaurant, good food, and obviously at least one really great human on the staff.
Food was delicious! Our server, Jay was amazing! Such a sweetheart, she made us feel very welcomed. Would come here again!
Cute, but overrated. The food is mediocre and bland, we left most of it on the plate.
This was the best brunch spot we found while in NYC. The food and drink were good, but the service was even better! Wish there were more places like this one!

Literally one of the best restaurants in NYC, hands down. Their buffalo wings are insanely good and so is the pancake burrito. But to be honest, everything on the menu is great. It's a nice option for couples, friends and families.
What a pleasant experience. Amazing breakfast and the staff was very attentive. Prices are a lil steep for breakfast but I will definitely return. Mac and cheese balls are to die for... so heavenly.

Postponed review but me and my boyfriend came here on our last day of our NY trip since it was very close and had great reviews. I was a little intimidated about the food since the plates looked large and very heavy (for breakfast.) Our server was okay nothing special but not rude or any of that. We were waiting for about 20 minutes after we received our drinks and we were saying to each other maybe they forgot about us (jokingly). But I said maybe this is the typical wait time (having no idea). A different waiter approached us and asked if we are still waiting and we said yes to which our server came to apologize about the wait and we said it was fine. The manager came out shortly after to offer apologies AND offered us a free milkshake for the inconvenience! I was honestly shocked because we weren't angry or anything but she still went above and beyond on a customer service level! We did end up getting the Nutella milkshake (just to try it ofc). The chicken and waffle was amazing! I've never tried that combo because I was afraid of the sweet maple syrup but it was for sure the best combination of flavors and a very generous portion. My boyfriend had the shrimps and grits which was equally good! The milkshake was a little too chocolatey for me but the Rice Krispies in it made it amazing. 10/10 we were very happy with this spot! Amazing customer service from the manager and amazing food for sure one of our fav breakfast spots we tried on our trip!

Atmosphere nice they play current hip hop inside waiter was very helpful with suggestion so we went with chicken and waffles and bacon minus the bacon was pretty tasty had extra like cheese sauce I thought was butter on the side I learn the hard way lmao jk but any who chicken breast was fried and seasoned to perfection had a side of egg scrambled hard pretty good has well no complaints I would eat here again and also recommend
No comment
Amazing food and drinks!! Our server was amazing 10/10!! Food came out within 10 minutes of ordering. As a New York City resident of 10 years I'm very impressed.
No comment
No comment
Stopped by Mom's on a recent trip my daughter and I made to see a Broadway show. We both got the fried chicken dinner and both agreed it ws perfect. Everything is right with this wonderful place.
No comment
Loved this place when I visited NYC with my partner! Food was so good and the staff were super polite. Will visit again when I'm back in the city.
No comment

We went with a group of 13 to have lunch. The restaurant was so accommodating and sat us in the wonderful heated outdoor seating. Our waiter, Lucas, could not have been nicer. Service was amazing. Everything came out in a timely manner and the food was delicious. The milk shakes were heavenly. We had a fabulous time.
No comment
No comment

Moms kitchen is a family gem. I love love love everything about this restaurant. From the family friendly atmosphere to the delicious shakes. Their shrimp and grits are amazing, not to mention their chicken and waffles. Customer service is always friendly and speedy. This establishment is COVID safe and follows precautions. I most definitely will be returning this is my new go to.
No comment
Great food, service, welcoming environment. Grits for days! Fun service and terrific time.

Excellent brunch! I tried my husband's shrimp and grits ... insane! Best grits I've ever had. Such creamy, cheesy goodness. Yummm!!! I had the porcini omelette and as a mushroom lover, it was fantastic. Not low fat but man, eggs cooked perfectly, no crustiness (hate crusty eggs), just creamy goodness. Daughter had the avocado toast that was so much more. Really eggs Benedict on avocado toast. Sooooo good.

Alex in the Bar is incredible. Honestly the best. We came in from out of town and had the best experience! Can't recommend this place enough. Thank you for the blue, fruity shot Alex!!!! It was much appreciated.
No comment
No comment

It's the service for me. Everyone there is fresh and happy to greet you! Food is pretty good, especially if you like huge meals and sweetness overloads! They have fruity pebble pancakes and sour gummy drinks. Very creative. We tried the chicken waffles and the pancake burrito. A solid meal that put us right to sleep afterwards!
love this place I really enjoyEd everything about this place, and my server was fantastic her name is Angelina she is the best server in the word!!!!!!!!!!!!

Came here for a late lunch on Sunday without a reservation. There was a much shorter wait than they told us there would be which was a pleasant surprise. I ordered the woodland omelette with a side of bacon and my friend ordered the pancake burrito (which is impossible to finish in one setting. It's savory, sweet, and fatty so he said)! The omelette and bacon were decent but this is not a place I would necessarily recommend to others. The servers were also super busy and it was a little difficult getting their attention, especially at the beginning of our meal. It's much more noisy inside than outside.

Wow, Mom's Kitchen & Bar was superb. Great for a group of friends. Chicken & Bacon Waffle that I have ordered was absolutely outstanding, it had a lot of flavor and was absolutely yummy. And also, the service was amazing and the staff was really pleasant. Can not wait to visit Mom's Kitchen & Bar again!
No comment
No comment
No comment
TY IS THE COOLEST MOM!! (And the most fun!) We had a blast here and the food was amazing! Great service, would definitely come back!

This was the perfect brunch spot! the wait was supposed to be two hours but it only took 30 minutes or so. The coolest waiter, who explained all of our questions, gave us so many recommendations, and was the perfect amount of enthusiastic. I shared the Mac and Cheese pancakes and it was soo yummy. The drinks were both unique and delicious and we had a good amount of them. Would highly recommend and would totally go back for more!

Somethings are worth the wait, and this place is worth the wait. The food is perfect there! Yes, hunger had something to do with it, but nothing is better than when you're hungry and the food actually is filling and tastes good. On top of that, the waitress Laina was one of the reasons why that being there and waiting an hour to eat was worth it. They were so kind, attentive, and quick with our orders that the time we spent there just seemed to have flown by. I would 100% to back to this location, as well as I would 100% recommend it to someone else. I'm not from New York, but I'm looking forward to visit it again and eating here is on my list!
DECADENT. Oh man. You gotta try to mac and cheese pancakes. This odd combination works better than you can imagine.
No comment

Visited for breakfast. Such a cute concept for this place! I love the decors and the food we ordered were all amazing! We had the Buffalo Mac and cheese bites, chicken & waffles and shrimp & grits. I must add - Chicken & waffles are amazing, a must try! Service was good, waitress did her part!
Was visiting New York and was my first time trying Mom's. Definitely recommend!! The staff and service was phenomenal
No comment
Great food! Service is awesome! Nice ambience! Menu is unique! Food is heavy, so this is great if you have a big appetite!!
Yelp reviews are accurate. Great good, friendly staff. Would highly recommend! Plenty of food so bring your appetite!

Mom's is one of my favorite comfort food spots! Who doesn't love Buffalo Mac and cheese balls. I am obsessed with their chicken and waffles. The flavor combo is amazing!  The Spicy marg called the Hot Girl Summer is served in a flamingo. The milkshakes are so good. Also recommend the adult CapriSun!! Everything is very shareable and comes in huge portions! Great staff and great environment!

The food was so good we went two days in a row! My mom is not an adventurous eater and has high food standards so for her to ask to go back to Mom's for a second meal means the restaurant was a hit! I loved Mom's not just for the food but because of the 90's and early 2000's nostalgia. If you're a millennial, then it feels like you've been transported back to middle school just with alcoholic drinks! The drinks were just ok but they featured candy and even inflatable toys so that was more of the draw. The menu is on notebook paper replicas and the decor includes old school lunchboxes. The food was comfort food and actually really good. Most restaurants that have a cool niche or are Instagram worthy typically have subpar food, but not Mom's! The food was the highlight here. I recommend the shrimp and grits, French toast, and pancake burrito. This place is pretty popular but the wait time was only about 20mins for Saturday brunch.
Love this place! The waitress was very friendly and the food was delicious. I will definitely visit again when I return to New York.

Mom's is a great spot to visit with friends. Especially brunch on the weekends. The food is good, drinks are better. Last time I was there, our server Ananya was super nice and I would totally look for her again when I go back. Great atmosphere, inside and outside seating, what more do you want?!?
No comment
No comment

I'm always looking for new places to eat by my job, so I stopped in here for the first time and fell in love! The vibe is so fun and the menu has so much comfort food that it was hard to pick what to get. My server Andreas was so knowledgeable and fun and I hope I have him every time I come back (and I will be back, many times, to try everything on the menu)!
No comment

Great service and great food. One of my favorite things to order are the Mac and cheese pancakes. I know, sounds weird right? It shouldn't work and yet it does. It has the hint of sweet flakiness of a pancake but the ooey goodness of Mac and cheese. It's a great source of comfort food if that's what your looking for. I mean who doesn't love a good comfort food spot. Another thing I order are their heavy metal fries. That alone is a meal within itself . Overall a 10/10
No comment

Our favorite neighborhood spot. We have come here for brunch a few times, and it never disappoints. My personal favorite is the potato griddle because it is so savory and hearty. I love that they mix regular potatoes and sweet potatoes in as their homefries. We always get the mac and cheese balls, the buffalo sauce on them have just a hint of spiciness, the mac and cheese just melts in your mouth. The bedrock pancakes are huge, very sweet and comes with a mix of berries on top. My friends have gotten the avocado toast a few times and rave about the unique toppings like the pickled red onions and brisket (extra to add the brisket). The mimosas are huge, but not too strong, still fun to order though! The music playlist is always such a fun vibe here, they have a big outdoor set up and even share tables with the place next door to help with the wait times.

We came across this restaurant on Yelp and we were so excited to try it out. When we arrived, the restaurant smelled of burning tire. We ignored the smell throughout our dinner. Our waitress was nice and she made sure we had water, which was really nice. We ordered the cinnamon shake and it was delicious! But sadly our food was subpar. They had great ideas, but the execution was poor. Maybe it was a bad night? Who knows?
Overpriced for very simple food(omelette very underwhelming), menu a little confusing. Chicken n waffles was good howeverd
Overpriced, mediocre food in a high traffic area. I've had worse but would not recommend this place. Cute atmosphere, good service.

Creative, delectable, and welcoming. The former is what to expect when you go to Mom's Kitchen and Bar. They have been climbing the ladder for one of the best brunch spots in the city, however I went for dinner and it was wonderful. Their combinations and creativity of foods is what amazes me while at the same time holding great, distinctive flavors between each ingredient. Also, great environment to relax and waiters/waitresses are awesome!
No comment
No comment
No comment
Portions are HUGE. Definitely delicious. Had the macaroni pancakes- if you have a sweet tooth, you'll die! :D
No comment
Food was delicious, service was amazing, everything about this places is just amazing! I will be coming back to this establishment.I would recommend the Chicken & Bacon Waffle and Steak and Eggs!

We were staying down the street to catch a cruise ship the next day and we were looking for a bite to eat. The hotel concierge recommended this place so we decided to take his advice and give it a try. The hostess was friendly and we were seated promptly. As soon as we were seated I immediately wanted to leave because the look and feel of the place seemed dark and a bit dirty. We decided to stay because we were a large group who was hungry and tired and just needed to eat and go to bed. I browsed the menu and didn't find anything appealing to me. I decided to look at the food pictures posted on yelp and the shakes looked good so I decided to order one from the picture I saw. According to the (mediocre waiter) they change their shake flavors often and just because you see it on yelp doesn't mean you can get it... bummer! The shake I did get was good but not worth the price. Everyone who did get food said it was just ok and they wished we had picked a different place. We were very underwhelmed.

Chance was amazing!!! It was our first time here and he had the best energy! His customer service was on point and he gave us recommendations, checked in on us, and was just really kind. I definitely recommend eating here. The food was soooo good too!
No comment
Great shakes and awesome atmosphere! Loved the decor and environment. We enjoyed our shake while admiring all of the fun decor!
No comment
They have really good foods and it's so delicious. I had a burger and it was stunningly yummy.
No comment
Mom's is the best! It's worth the wait on a weekend for the yummy food and great service.

I typically hate vegan cheese, but this vegan buffalo mac and cheese gave me life. The non-vegans I was with didn't realize this was vegan yet scarfed it down in less than 60 seconds. This is on their "Mom's Fit Bit" menu, as is a good looking vegan quiche. Who knew a southern comfort/ "brunch food on crack" restaurant would be so accommodating to their plant-based brethren. Into it!
No comment

Stopped in for a Saturday brunch and enjoyed it. We sat at the counter since there were only two of us and we didn't want to wait for a table. Mom's has the ambiance & vibe figured out - "diner"-esque, but still modern and photo-worthy. The egg white scramble was fine, nothing crazy good but not bad either. Home fries are basically just a combo of potato & sweet potato chunks but I really liked them! I added a side of vegan sausage - pay attention, because when they brought our food out he said "pork sausage"... I confirmed with the bartender and she rang it in wrong. They had the vegan one out very quickly but I'm glad I was paying attention! Ended up too full for a milkshake but hoping to stop in for one next time.
No comment

I was on my way back to my hotel and wanted something in the way of comfort food. Found this place, perused the menu on the window, and a very nice young man came out to see if I had any questions. My buttermilk chicken with mash and mac n cheese was very good. Great service in a cool location. Definitely worth future visits...do try.

We hit this place up for brunch and had a great time. I had the pancake burrito which is a healthy serving of goodness. We arrived at 11am and were seated right away. It did get crowded soon there after. It was outdoor seating due to the pandemic. They had outdoor heating but I was still chilly. Friendly staff.

This was our favorite meal while visiting NYC.  We ordered steak and eggs, avocado toast and the  French toast.  The portions are huge as are the mimosas.  Everyone loved their meals.  Also, loved the atmosphere.

Jaylavy thank you for giving us such an awesome experience at Mom's kitchen! The food was superb and excellent customer service. I appreciate Jay being so attentive to our nutritional restrictions. We will be back for brunch!!!!!!
No comment

A neighborhood diner and bar  Salads were big and very good. Chicken sandwich was good. Mac and Cheese balls were probably the only item I didn't like.  Lots of breadcrumbs holding it together and this held a lot of of the frying grease. They also had sauces which made them very fatty. Monster shakes were very rich and a bit over flavored.  I'd stick to simple ones. Mine had frosting on the outside, which was overkill.

Was looking for a brunch place and stumbled upon mom's kitchen and bar in the area. The place was pretty busy on a Sunday around 3PM but no wait to be seated for a party of 2. Service was great, food came fast and food was delicious!! I'm still dreaming about the fruity pebble pancakes. Now, most pancakes I've ever had are usually hyped for its presentation. But these were so fluffy and the fruity pebbles really meshed in the dough! Mac and cheese was great as well and my friend loved his steak and eggs although I thought it could've been juicier. Prices are also reasonable. Can't wait to come back here :)

Friends of mine were in from out of town and didn't really know the area or 9th Avenue and I was about to make suggestions when one of them said "what about that place Mom's Kitchen" I said let's go- it is a big place with seating as you walk in and on the opposite side. We were seated immediately and given menus. I got the chicken cranberry salad, another friend decided to build her own burger and the third friend, a vegetarian opted for a meatless option. The food was good and everyone was satisfied with their choices. The waitperson was attentive and accommodating and the restroom was clean and well kept. I would once again recommend and return. A great place to take visiitors!
I had a great time here. My server was the best I ever had. They need more of him in restaurants. I enjoyed  my omelet.Will come back.

This was the best place I could have gone for my 21st birthday! They had local drag show which was super fun and interactive. The service was splendid! Our server was Chance was so attentive and seriously helped the night go smoothly. Not to mention the succulent drink menu which was a wonderful introduction to adult drinks.

Tough review. Food was for the most part pretty solid. buffalo wings fantastic. meaty, juicy and delicately crispy with good flavor. Shrimp were ok probably the low  point though the only real problem is that they didn't really impress. I love picking my sides here... but the way everything comes in a different plate or bowl really does make the meal feel kinda disjointed.  I enjoyed my meal, and I'm guessing the get the full experience you need to get dessert here. maybe next time.
No comment
The menu looks amazing and unique. We did not eat, but had adult beverages. The Bloody Mary was amazing. Loved our waiter too. He was the nicest
A good breakfast place. I had the god wrap really good. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a meal. The wait was around 30-45 mins for my food but besides that it was really good.
No comment

The food was decent - we had the fried chicken sandwich which came as a massive portion and was great.  Also had eggs, bacon and potato breakfast which was great except the bacon was pretty chewy and not crispy.

Omg the food was so yummy! We ordered the Chicken and Bacon, Return of the Mac and shakes! Best comfort food I've had in a long time.

Really good spot.  We came here on a rainy Spring day for lunch and could have eaten forever.  The adult grilled cheese is amazing and the brisket sandwich was a good choice as well.  The milkshakes are beauties to look at and taste.

I looked this place up because it looked fun and kid friendly. We ordered the wings in sweet and spicy, they were tasty and a build your own burger. The burger came out with out the cheese that we ordered then over cooked when we got it back. Food over all took a while. Then we had to wait to get the burger recooked. Good atmosphere for brunch or family but food isn't out of this world.

Love this place , shakes are awesome , pretty pricey but overall good food , chicken Waffles is great !!

No comment

Food was great! The restaurant's concept was very fun. The only thing was that our side of mac and cheese came out after we finished our food! We probably wouldn't have needed the side anyway because the waffle was already filling.
Fantastic food, creatively missed cocktails, great and friendly service - shoutout to Chance for a great Friday night dinner. Highlights: grits and the Mom's burger. Wonderful time

I came in today and had the chicken and waffles. Food was absolutely delicious and the staff was so attentive and so nice! I def will be back soon and will be bringing my family that loves to find new brunch places! Thank you !!!!!!
Great placemfor a heavy breakfast/brunch!!! Recomend the pancake burrito!!! Looks is clean and practice social distancing
We came in for brunch and we were impressed. I recommend splitting the Pancake Burrito.
No comment

I went to this place today for the first time with a friend for brunch. The menu is expansive and creative. There was a bit of a wait but it was Sunday at peak brunch time so what good place didn't have one...I got the big a** marg and it did what it needed to do, especially for the price. I give this place 5 stars because there was a slight issue with my order that my server noticed. A manager came over to inquire about it and after me telling him several times that it wasn't a big deal, he went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied. They wait staff also greets you with "welcome home" which is a pleasant treat.

Came here with my mom and my aunt (moms pick based on what she found on Google) to have brunch. I was running late so my mom ordered my the shrimp and grits. I have had this combo in a very long time and honestly, this was a great way to have it again. The shrimp is soooooo well seasoned. I do wish they boiled the grits out just a tad bit more to get rid of that grainy taste but not a reason to get crazy over. I'd certainly come back to try more dishes!
No comment

I had an amazing experience here at Mom's Kitchen & Bar. Affordable rates for this area. The menu is really wonderful, so many good choices, I had to go with Veggie Burger, and it was magnificent. Service was good and everyone working here was really nice and generous. I'd say my experience here was perfect.
No comment
Delicious food and amazing service. We couldn't believe how delicious it was. The value was so good and the service and food were amazing.

My favorite waitress is Jade with the black curly hair. Shes the best never have any issues with her. It was one time this guy messed up my boyfriend and I orders like he didn't even regard our special requests and took forever with our food. But the manager came out and was very nice he offered to remake our food (which was cold) over fresh and he even put our appetizer on the house! They definitely care about their customers. The food is delicious here and the drinks. My boyfriend and I come here all the time.

Oh my God, Mom's Kitchen & Bar was definitely mind-blowing. Superb location. I was told to try their Big Daddy Brisket Sandwich, which was wonderful, but all other menu items were good too. Staff: superb. Attentive and professional. I will come back again and try something new.

I am happy to say I was not disappointed by Mom's Kitchen & Bar. It's comfy, clean and attractive. Every thing in the menu looked fantastic, but I had to go with Tex Benedict, it was a fantastic meal. The team members ensured I was helped and answered all my questions really politely and enthusiastically. I'm definitely visiting here soon.

so good, we came back a second time to try their breakfast options. the bartender/ server was super nice and the drinks were spectacular. I promise it's worth the price. Plates are shareable and delicious. highly recommend

Let me tell you, Mom's Kitchen & Bar was simply cool. It's in a perfect location and we were definitely pleased with our experience. I have to admit, Chicken & Bacon Waffle was really fantastic. I think that I could perhaps have a new favorite dish now. Staff was really nice - absolutely genuine. I loved it.

EXCELLENT food and fantastic service!! Here with my girl friends and such a fun atmosphere  Dana took care of us and was the best!! Helped us choose and her suggestions didn't disappoint  word of advice, MOM-osa is great!
No comment

This place is AAAAAAAZING!!! Don't thing twice, get the Mac and cheese pancakes, Mamosa, and a side of vegan sausage. Your welcome!!! Staff is absolutely wonderful, interior is dope and they play cartoons!! Food is the best we have had!!!!

We went here as part of an overnight getaway and HOLY COW was it good. My husband got the chicken and waffles- the chicken was seasoned to perfection and had a great texture (you know how chicken can be rubbery, ew). I'm boring so I got the waffle with egg whites and bacon. Also, the bacon was SO thick and had a phenomenal flavor. We also got a yummy milkshake. 10/10 recommend

No comment
We had a fantastic time here. Drinks were wonderful, the vibe overall was fantastic. Nina was our server and she was amazing, very personable and friendly I will definitely request her in the future!
Loved Nina! the drinks were so great and the out door seating was fun

Great little restaurant, great music, super cool vibe, good food. Themed in the 90's with Teen Titans Go playing on TV's very family friendly. My daughters shared the Rainbow Brite shake which they loved, we all had breakfast for dinner. Waffles & chicken, scrambled eggs with toast & homefries, and a Belgian waffle. The toast comes with delicious raspberry butter, the eggs are scrambled with chives (take note not all like chives), the homefries are a mixture of white potatoes and sweet potatoes. My kids had never had fruity pebbles (I know I deprived them) but they found that part of the shake "too" sweet. Our server was good, and food came out timely, there wasn't a wait to be seated at dinner time on a cold February Saturday night.
Yummy caramel apple pancakes topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Great wait staff too.

I don't like to give bad reviews because covid life sucks and everyone has bad days. Now technology makes you look at them forever. That said, I went here years ago, and loved it. They should just close and reopen after pandemic.

The environment was awesome. In town visiting from texas. My husband and I Loved the mom-osa's. Good good. Steak and eggs were good. Husband ordered. Chicken and gravy was also really really good! Would recommend.

OMG, Mom's Kitchen & Bar was really wonderful. It's the little things that make Mom's Kitchen & Bar so great. The food selection was certainly interesting, but Big Daddy Brisket Sandwich was especially incredible. All of the staff are incredibly pleasant - you certainly feel welcome and taken care of. Mom's Kitchen & Bar... Love it.
Hector was amazing! The food was also great. Portions were huge and extremely satisfying. Will def come back again.

What a happy place! BBQ brisket is absolutely delicious. No fat, just really tasty meat! Loved it on my salad. The crazy shake didn't just look good; it tasted good. Service was friendly and atmosphere ROCKS. Clean and enjoyable. Can't wait to go back.

We waited about an hour because of no indoor seating. This was late Jan 2021. We were seated in an outdoor heated table. The heater did not help much but it was that or nothing. I guess when the weather gets better we can go back and try again.

I came here after a boat ride on 'The Beast' (which was amazing by the way). We were able to be sat right away. The decor in this place is adorable. My fiancé ordered the Pancake Burrito while I ordered the Mac & Cheese Pancakes. His pancake burrito looked small but it was filled to the brim. He throughly enjoyed it. My Mac & Cheese Pancakes were HUGE and I barely got through half. I thought it was decent, a little too cheesy for me - sorry to say. Our server was very nice but was missing more than half of time which definitely takes a point away. We ended with a Fluffleapagus big shake which was good but I've had much better extreme, big shakes so it was kind of a let down. I would probably check out this place again at some point.
No comment

No comment
No comment

The food was incredible, and our server Noah was attentive, kind, and enthusiastic. My parents don't visit the city often, and Mom's was perfect for them. They felt comfortable and welcome, which is a big deal. We also brought a big party on a Friday night, and they sat us immediately and Noah gave us amazing service. Can't wait to come back!
No comment

Noah was an absolute pleasure! Not only does he have great taste and style, he is a killer waiter! Super great food, the capri sun cocktails take you right back to elementary school. I left my cell phone on the table and he made sure to contact me to retrieve it! Big Moves! Definitely hit up Moms when in NYC and be sure to ask for Noah!
I always sit at the bar when I come here and the service is AMAZING! The drinks are great and the food is decent.
No comment

Just wanted to give a shout-out to Diana, who is an amazing server. She is kind and considerate, and keeps those Party pouches coming! The Party Pouch is literally everything good about my childhood, but upgraded!
No comment

Let me tell you, Mom's Kitchen & Bar was certainly fantastic. Can't wait to try every single thing off the menu here. Everything I've tried until now is good. Crew was extremely sweet and helpful in every way possible. But that's just me.

I come here with my girlfriend after work sometimes, and I love the food. Most recently a guy named chance(?) helped us out and he was nothing but lovely. Will come again and hope to see him again!
Always love our experience at Mom's! We were lucky enough to have Sarah as our server again - so got the best service! Will definitely be back :)

Came here after going to the theater--my mom and I had a veggie burger and an omelette, which were both good. The mushroom omelette was especially tasty! We were served by the wonderful and kind Noah (honestly ask for him he's a gem). All of the servers were very kind and it was a great place to come for a post-theater meal or getting drinks
Everything was absolutely delicious, Noah was amazing and incredibly thoughtful. I highly recommend for your first stay in New York.
No comment

OMG! Went here for brunch everyday during my birthday trip. Everyone was friendly and welcoming, the music was amazing and the food was especially TO DIE FOR! They even gave me a free milkshake with a candle because it was my birthday and it was just a great way to start my day my entire trip.
No comment
This restaurant was a cute little hole in the wall with great food! & The strawberry shake is a MUST have!
No comment

Came for breakfast before our flight home.  Typical diner breakfast of eggs, bacon and sausage...kinda hard to mess that up, but it was good.  I only wish the coffee was better; why can't diners serve better coffee!

My friend and I came in on a Sunday night. For drinks, we ordered the MOM-osa (20 oz!!!) and the Mom's Hard Latte (note: very sweet). We also both ordered the chicken and waffles. OH MY GOSH. You will not be disappointed if you are in the need of some comfort food. The sauce on top was a bit on the saltier side, but so worth it. Next time, I am ordering the mac and cheese pancakes!
No comment

Today was my first time bath moms. I had a seat at the bar with the Super Sarah!!!! Everything was awesome she was in fire the drinks were ice cold the food was piping hot. She answer every question and catered to every need. Definitely coming back and I hope the bar tender is as good as Sarah!!.
No comment
Food is so good and the drinks too. The service is nice and sweet. Can't wait to go back.
Rock solid place for drinks and especially brunch. Generous portions and strong pours. Friendly staff. Great neighborhood joint!
No comment
This is a great take. Went out in the rain in search of breakfast and coffee. Went in on a whim! Delicious breakfast. Reasonable pricing. Great service.

What a special place!! I was walking down ninth avenue looking for a breakfast spot when I came across Mom's and let me tell you this place does not disappoint!! The decor, the vibe and the service is top notch. I ended up ordering the chicken and bacon waffle, recommended by Lucas. Who by the way is an absolute gem and he alone is a reason to come here. He made me feel right at home and was full of knowledge and hospitality. I also ordered a yummy MOM-osa....these things are HUGE! Service: 10/10. Food: 10/10. Worth it? YES. I will be coming back for sure. THANKS MOM! :)

Bryan the bartender was amazing and welcoming. He knew just what I needed. He was able to multi take between tables and the bar. Other staff was great as well keeping company with quick conversations here and there because I was alone. Food BOMB.. so damn good!!! Drinks yummm, can't wait to go back with my friends!

This place was kinda strange... The music made me feel like I was at the club, but the crowd ranged from children to a few elderly folks.  The menu was different, we chose the closest thing to something we recognized, some kind of eggs Benedict with jalapenos on it.  It was ok, but I wouldn't order it again.  One of the waiters was wearing a cotton striped tank top, which seemed kinda outside of the vibe of the place, but hey who am I to judge him, this is NYC!

The food was really good! It was busy and service was kind of slow, but the atmosphere was still very friendly. I would definitely come back here for brunch! They give you goodie bags at the end which was really fun & interesting. The drinks were great and came in big cups. Expect a real boozy brunch experience. I would recommend checking this place out at least once. I'm probably getting a shake next time because they looked really good. The food is definitely IG worthy too.
Great Mac-n-Cheese, Shrimp and grits was spot on, along with the green beans. Had high hopes for the grilled cheese, but not so good unfortunately.

Great stop on my way home!  If you're in the area you must stop in!  Jumbo wings that are actually "jumbo"!  Moms Pilsner is great as well.  With Covid it was by far the cleanest experience I've had with my utensils presented in a ziplock bag!  Well done Mom's Kitchen!  See you again soon. IG @jeffreyjohnsanders Best of luck during this difficult time.

I was searching for a place to get breakfast close to our hotel and ran across this place. The atmosphere is great, it's like walking into a 90's mom's kitchen. I got the Bedrock Pancakes, which were huge and delicious, and hot apple cider. The food came out quick and fresh, and we were in and out in no time.
